name: Masala Omelette
description: A fluffy omelette cooked with onions, tomatoes, chilies, and traditional Indian spices.

name: Egg Curry (Red Gravy)
description: Boiled eggs simmered in a spicy tomato and chili-based red curry.

name: Egg Curry (Yellow Gravy)
description: Boiled eggs cooked in a turmeric-rich yellow curry with mild spices.

name: Egg Korma
description: Eggs cooked in a creamy cashew and yogurt-based white gravy with aromatic spices.

name: Egg Fried Rice
description: Fried rice tossed with scrambled eggs, soy sauce, and vegetables.

name: Egg Biryani
description: Aromatic rice layered with spiced boiled eggs, fried onions, and saffron.

name: Boiled Egg Masala
description: Hard-boiled eggs coated in a dry, spicy onion-tomato masala.

name: Egg Bhurji
description: Scrambled eggs cooked with onions, tomatoes, chilies, and Indian spices.

name: Cheese Omelette
description: A soft omelette filled with melted cheese for a rich, creamy flavor.

name: Egg Roll
description: Paratha roll stuffed with spiced eggs, onions, and chutney.

name: Anda Pav
description: Mumbai-style street food with spicy egg bhurji served with buttered pav bread.

name: Egg Sandwich
description: A toasted sandwich filled with boiled eggs, mayonnaise, and fresh vegetables.

name: Egg Cutlet
description: Crispy fried cutlets made with boiled eggs, breadcrumbs, and spices.

name: Egg Pakora
description: Boiled egg halves dipped in chickpea flour batter and deep fried.

name: Stuffed Egg Curry
description: Eggs stuffed with spiced filling and cooked in a rich red curry.
